subject: Got Shafted on Ebay...Not really
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_2bd0e0.17a5b693.39e24a9a_boundary
Content-Type: multipart/alternative;
	boundary="part1_2bd0e0.17a5b693.39e24a9a_alt_boundary"


--part1_2bd0e0.17a5b693.39e24a9a_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


I got a 12-150 on ebay, but the radio wouldn't work on DC (Battery)  power. 
 So, this will be a AC (Plug In) box only.  The guy felt bad  and refunded 
my money and told me to keep the radio.  So, i'll probably  just give this 
one away for the cost of parts and shipping to someone who can  use a box at 
home.
 
I already found 9V on the board, so i can start to build the sweep  circuit 
for it now.  Should be up and running tonite.  Since i found  9V on the 
board, i will be adding this as a new feature on the "Steve's Box"  line.  
Future boxes will be both AC and DC powered, it will only cost me 1  more wire 
to solder.  I can use the same ground for both.
 
-Steve
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/) 
_http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/_ 
(http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/)
